item.title: Chapter II:Importance Of Education
item.description: Education is a powerful weapon that aids an individual to face the adversities of life and overcome societal stigmas such as poverty, fear, status to achieve success. Education is the hope of development and success for most third-world countries and the world’s dominion countries. Mandatory education builds the scope of better growth and development. Role of Education in India Education has the potential to revolutionize the course of a nation – with skilled and educated youths.

item.title: AIML
item.description: AI n ML Bullet 1 2 3 Four Things to remember One Two

item.title: Chapter I: Pollution
item.description: Pollution is the process in which undesirable toxic contaminants contaminate our environment like air, water, soil, etc. It is creating sudden changes in the ecosystem, which is directly on indirectly leaving adverse effects on the lives of human beings, animals, and plants. It creates an imbalance in the natural system. Many things which are making our lives easy are harmful to the environment. For example, vehicles leave gases that pollute the air.
